scripts.import:wien: ts-node -e "import('./app/lib/importers/wienInfoImporter.ts').then(m => m.importWienInfoEvents({ debug: true })).then(stats => console.log('Import complete:', stats))"
scripts.import:wien:dry-run: ts-node -e "import('./app/lib/importers/wienInfoImporter.ts').then(m => m.importWienInfoEvents({ dryRun: true, debug: true })).then(stats => console.log('Dry-run complete:', stats))"

dependencies._comment_isomorphic-dompurify: Pinned to 2.16.0 due to ESM/CommonJS incompatibility in serverless environments. See BLOG_ESM_FIX.md for details.
